”san” pilibandawa niwaradi lesin asa therum gena, ”san” dana ganimen (sanda) me ekathu kirime niyatha ka්riya kalapaya awabodha karagath pasu ”san” upadawa ganimen wen wi, (wissan) walaki, sanwara wi, sansindawa, aluthin ”san” bihi kirimata upakara wu mul galawa dama (nibbisan), me (gatha) ge sadana ayithikaruwa pilibandawath niwaradi awabodhayak laba gath pasu, nawatha nawathath dukata path wimata mul wu hethuwa (jathi) upatha bawama therum gena chathurarya sathyayanma awabodha karaganimen siyalu aakara wu sankhara pawathwimen thora wi, (wisankhara gathan chiththan), panchaskandhaya ekathu karamin geyak nirmanaya kirime ka්riyawaliyenda wen wi (gahakutan wisan khithan) khina jathi yana uthum arahath thaththwayata pathwannata upakara wu thanhawen ha madayen midi nidahas wunemi’’ yanna ihatha gathawala arthaya we.
namuth kalu warnaya bhawithayata aawe kalu pahathii kondayata wadi denaku alum kirima hethuwen wiya hakiyayi samaja wishleshakayo pawasathi.

yuddhayen hani wu pradesha sanwardhanaya kara siwil palanaya aarambha kirime di anugamanaya kala apema kramawedaya nisa piripun prajathanthrawadayak merata sthapitha kirimata haki wu bawa aarakshaka lekam gotabhaya rajapaksha mahatha pawasiya.me pradesha sanwardhanaya kirima sandaha noyek ratawal noyek yojana idiripath kalath apata apage kramaweda jayagrahanaya kala haki bawa ada uthuru nangenahira pradesha dakimen lokayata peni yana bawa gotabhaya mahatha sandahan kaleya.nangenahira koti nayakayawa siti winayagamurthi muralidaran nohoth karuna amman ada wana wita niyojya amathiwarayeku bawath, pilleyan nohoth shiwaneshanthureyi chandrakanthan nangenahira pradhana amathi bawata path wi athi bawath gotabhaya rajapaksha mahatha penwa dunneya.hitapu koti nayakayin mewani prajathanthrawadi nayakayan bawata pathkirima thulin ada me rate athi samaya saha prajathanthrawadayata wenath sakki awashya nowana bawa da, gotabhaya mahatha awadharanaya kaleya.wasara thihakata pasu uthuru nangenahira palathwala chandaya pawathi bawath, ema chandayen drawida paksha niyojithayan rasak pradeshiya deshapalana nayakayan bawata path wi athi bawath rajapaksha mahatha kiya.yuddhaya pawathi pradeshawala jana jiwithaya me wana wita itha samanya thaththwayata path wi athi bawath, owunwa ema thaththwayata pathkirima sandaha aarakshaka ansha saha rajaya mahath kapakirim sidu kala bawath aarakshaka lekamwaraya sandahan kaleya.
ape anek kridawalata sapekshawa krikat kridakayanta awashya karana siyaluma pahasukam sapayala thiyenawa.
ee tramp amarikanu gowin amatha: “gowin wana oba sandaha api yuropaya wiwrutha kara aththemu” yayi pawasimath samaga ya.

thanata nisi nuwanathi, ekata hasirimata sudusuwu, mana hasurum ha dharana pragnya athi, kalyana mithrayaku idin noladde nam dinagath rajaya hara, (hudakalawa wanayata anda thapas pawiddata pamini mahajanaka) raju menda, (hasthi samuhaya harapiya me rakshitha wanayehi hudakalawa hasirena) parileyyaka nam athu menda samuhayen wenwa hudakalawa wasaya karanneya.
thawada bhaddaliya, mahana thema prithiyage da wiragayen upeksha athi wa weseyi.

muhurtha budurajanan wahansegen palamu warata niyatha wiwarana laba paramitha puramin pamini ee maithri bosathanan wahanse awasan warata niyatha wiwarana labuwe gauthama budurajanan wahansegenya. 1 awasan warata niyatha wiwarana labima 2 melowa pahala wima 3 kumara wiya saha gihi geyin nikmima (abhinishkramanaya) 4 buddhathwayata path wima saha mara parajaya 5 buddha shasanaya awasan warata niyatha wiwarana labima[sanskaranaya] maithri bosathanan wahanse awasan warata niyatha wiwarana labanne gauthama budurajanan wahansegenya.
